39326940.review:
From watching the trailer, I was a little worried that the game's animation seemed bad compared to the past 3, but I bought it on a whim, and I was genuinely surprised! 

This is definitely the funniest Freddi Fish game(though I don't have the fifth one so I don't have anything to compare it to), with a lot of jokes and humor that even got me to laugh. The animation is good as always, though it looks a little rusty in some spots. I'd recommend this one over the third game by far, as it is a lot more interesting, and Luther is a much better character.

One problem I do have is that in the ending sequence, Freddi and Luther had problems with the mouth movements, with Luther's mouth moving when Freddi was talking, and sometimes neither of their mouths moving. Night Dive, could you patch that? It definitely wasn't a problem in the original disc release.

You really really should check this game out for your kids if you have them, and it's still a fun game to play by yourself.

39155043.review:
Humongous Entertainment have done it again.

Join Freddi and Luther on a thrilling adventure in a fictional world where coral reefs are healthy and the fish eat taffy.

With innovative features such as collectible sea urchins, a lack of loot boxes and a strong female protagonist, this penultimate installment of the Freddi Fish pentalogy will blow any AAA game out of the water.

ok jks the game is broken
but it was good when i was 6

38724938.review: You get to dress up as a cool wrestler and drink sodas 10/10

36469592.review: Unico gioco per Mac in italiano di Humongous Entertainment (mentre Nightdive Studios ne ha solo un altro, qui su Steam). Questa politica degli editori è solo un'occasione persa per ampliare il numero degli acquirenti! Venendo al game, per lo stile della grafica e per la semplicità della storia, di certo è un gioco rivolto a bambini/e. Ma anche per noi adulti potrebbe essere (almeno un poco) interessante. Penso comunque che per un/una bambino/a ci sia bisogno di un adulto per assicurare un progresso continuo, altrimenti il rischio è che il piccolo finisca per essere frustrato nell’azione di gioco: non è presente un “aiuto” e non c’è una mappa, quindi si può procedere solo avendo molta pazienza e prestando attenzione ai dialoghi con i vari personaggi ed alle scene. I più piccoli possono essere stimolati nella loro abilità di risoluzione dei problemi, imparando anche una piccola “morale” su ciò che è bene e su ciò che è male. Complessivamente, il consiglio è di acquistarlo solo se lo trovare ad un prezzo super-scontato. E se cercate giochi per bambini/e piccoli/e, potete trovare di meglio qui (ad esempio, si veda la mia recensione di “The Zwuggels - A Beach Holiday Adventure for Kids”) o in altri store per Mac!

35116549.review: An Instant Childhood Point-and-Click Classic from the Days of my Childhood, which consist of the old MS-DOS, Windows 3.1, Windows 95, Windows 98 & Windows 98SE PCs in which you help Freddi Fish & her best Friend Luther as they search for the Missing Hogfish and catch the Rustlers who kidnapped them. So grab your Ten Gallon Hat & Saddle Up for some Grand Old Fun down at Briny Gulch!

34751829.review:
Очень долго потел над мини-игрой, где устрица уничтожает пузырики. Доходил до десятого уровня, а дальше уже не мог. Со временем планирую поднять свой скилл и дать этим мыльным засранцам ***ды. 
Но эта часть из всей серии мне ещё с детства не особо нравилась, в основном из-за своей хардкорности. Целый час тупо не мог понять куда засунуть отверку и как проплыть под медузами. 
В игре присутствует садизм (когда маленькая зелёная рыбка ела перец/лимон и ещё что-то, ей явно было плохо и требовалась медицинская помощь, но Фредди просто наблюдала за этим и улыбалась). 
Респект вору, который пояснил за воровской шмот. Чисто отдельная уважуха от всей братвы. 
В общем и целом, эта часть неплохая, хоть и заставляет подумать, рандомизация событий скрашивает перепрохождения чудо-игры. Хотя в конце давит на психику, когда нужно сделать выбор, кого обвинить в преступлении.
Если вы дочитали этот поехавший обзор до конца, то вас явно обижают в семье.
Подписывайтесь на мой канал, ставьте лайки, всем спасибо, пока!!!!

10 русских рыб-свиней из 10

28330539.review:
Well, I can safely say that that was the worst Freddi Fish game I've played yet. I know, it's a bold claim with Freddi Fish 1 and 2 being so bland and terribly-made but I legitimately think this is the worst of the bunch.

Freddi Fish 4 starts you up on the traditional Freddi Fish plotline- you're going to some event, when it's been postponed due to a problem that's been incited by someone (either singular or plural) having done something that's "just plain wrong" in the eyes of our titular character, and you decided to go beyond the boundaries of the law to stop that plain wrong thing from continuing. And like the first two games there isn't a whole lot of mystery. It's just finding a rustler disguise. You know where the hideout is and who stole the hogfish. It's just getting in that becomes the bulk of the story- not the mystery of who stole it, but how to get in and free the hogfish. 

The story goes by so alarmingly fast and has so many faults in it, that it's hard to find anything I really liked in it, apart from the unintentionally funny one-liners and horrible presentation quality. I've never played a Humongous game with such a lack of focus on detail. Sure, I like to insult Putt Putt and the last few Freddi Fish games, but they still animated their games well and didn't have glitches or issues with characters and their backgrounds. Freddi and Luther oftentimes appear beneath an object, but still are swimming as if they're in front of it, and sometimes characters that are standing with their legs look like they're floating above the ground. 

Even the lip-syncing is thrown way off; making the ending espcially funny. During the scene where you discover who stole the hogfish with a final clue (Freddi Fish 3 style) Freddi and Luther keep moving their mouths, but its Freddi's voice that's coming out of both of them. Uncanny and creepy, but still hilarious to no end. 

Honestly, what I hate the most about Freddi Fish 4 is that it doesn't really progress forward from the last few games. There was a rise in quality from Freddi Fish 1-3, though it wasn't astounding. Freddi Fish 3 actually had a mystery, and I genuinely wanted to find out the answer behind it. Freddi Fish 4 just borrows the drab backgrounds that plagued Freddi Fish 1 and 2, and steals the cheap final clue and culprit ending of 3 without doing anything to improve itself in that regard. 

I know this sounds oddly sophisticated for a review on a game intended for 5-year-olds, but I still appreciate the Humongous games that have enough quality and polish in them for both kids and adults. And the only 3 games that have enough polish in their library to be recommended are still only Pajama Sam 1 and 3, and Spy Fox 3. While the rest of their games have been slightly charming, Freddi Fish 4 just feels astoundingly lazy. Very little time or effort was put into this installment, and it really shows unfortunately. I'm giving Freddi Fish 4 a 2/10.

17081015.review:
More Freddi Fish adventures.
Story is rather simple - we must help Luther's uncle to find stolen hogfish. The culprit is different every time so there is  some replayability. However thief is revealed in the very end so you have to play the whole game and it is kinda long in comparison with previous games. There are 2 slightly different paths and most walkthroughs don't cover the second one (the one where you have to use pepper to get harmonica); bubblegum is useless in this one.
Interactivity is still at the top - every single background detail has it's own animation. There is also a music player + recorder with many samples, asteroids-like game and something else I missed. 
Music is comfy, art is pretty. Cool game pls play.

13474831.review:
Een kleine handleiding voor mensen die het spel in het Nederlands willen spelen:

https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8487-WSCN-4121&amp

1. Log in op je Steam-account.
2. Klik met de rechtermuisknop op een spel uit je spellenlijst en kies Eigenschappen (of Properties).
3. Ga naar het tabblad Taal (of Language).
4. Kies de gewenste taal uit het menu.
5. Klik op OK.

Het is handig als je dit doet vóór je het spel geïnstalleerd hebt. Anders moet Steam de taal apart downloaden en moet je nog wat langer wachten.

Veel speelplezier!

11478819.review:
For whatever reason I have the most vivid memories of this one out of all of these. I don't know why considering that this is the weakest since the first from a gameplay standpoint; the randomization is really stripped back to a few minor minor things; there's only one puzzle that changes out of everything in the game, even.
Though from a writing/flavor/humor standpoint this is probably the best so far, I still chuckled at some of the jokes here. That might be why I recall it the most of the series.
